content.description: Which of the following correctly indicates the temperature of the blackbody and the rate at which it emits energy at time <math alttext="lowercase t sub 2" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>t</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msub> </math>?
content.question: Temperature at <math alttext="lowercase t sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> Rate at which energy is emitted at <math alttext="lowercase t sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> A <math alttext="the fraction uppercase T over 2" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math> <math alttext="the fraction P over 16" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>P</mi><mn>16</mn></mfrac></math> B <math alttext="the fraction uppercase T over 2" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math> <math alttext="16 P" overflow="scroll"><mn>16</mn><mi>P</mi></math> C <math alttext="2 uppercase T" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>T</mi></math> <math alttext="the fraction P over 16" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>P</mi><mn>16</mn></mfrac></math> D <math alttext="2 uppercase T" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>T</mi></math> <math alttext="16 P" overflow="scroll"><mn>16</mn><mi>P</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
